meanings.definition: The quality or state of being extremely precise or accurate.
meanings.sent1: Her ultraprecisions in measurements ensured the experiment's success.
meanings.sent2: The ultraprecisions of the watchmaker's work were admired by all.
meanings.sent3: The chef's ultraprecisions in cutting vegetables made them look like art pieces.
meanings.sent4: His ultraprecisions in storytelling captivated the audience's imagination.
meanings.sent5: The ultraprecisions of the surgeon's hands saved many lives.

meanings.definition: The act of achieving an extremely high level of precision or accuracy.
meanings.sent1: The team celebrated their ultraprecisions in hitting the target.
meanings.sent2: Practice and dedication led to the ultraprecisions in their dance routine.
meanings.sent3: The robot's ultraprecisions in assembly amazed the factory workers.
meanings.sent4: Her ultraprecisions in solving puzzles made her the champion.
meanings.sent5: The ultraprecisions of the archer's shot left everyone in awe.
